amendment.description: To establish the Federal Emergency Management Agency as an independent agency, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4563 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 32 - 66. Record Vote Number: 193.

action.text: Amendment SA 4563 proposed by Senator Akaka for Senator Clinton. (consideration: CR S7320-7325, S7326) To establish the Federal Emergency Management Agency as an independent agency, and for other purposes.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 4563 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 32 - 66. Record Vote Number: 193.
